item.title: Fluffy Kitty Susan add a quote by Lang Leav
item.description:
"What was it like to love him? Asked Gratitude. It was like being exhumed, I answered, and brought to life in a flash of brilliance.
What was it like to be loved in return? Asked Joy. It was like being seen after a perpetual darkness, I replied. To be heard after a lifetime of silence.
What was it like to lose him? Asked Sorrow. There was a long pause before I responded:
It was like hearing every goodbye ever said to me—said all at once." -- Lang Leav

item.title: Fluffy Kitty Susan add a quote by Lang Leav
item.description: "Soul Mates<br /> I don’t know how you are so familiar to me—or why it feels less like I am getting to know you and more as though I am remembering who you are. How every smile, every whisper brings me closer to the impossible conclusion that I have known you before, I have loved you before—in another time, a different place, some other existence." -- Lang Leav

item.title: Fluffy Kitty Susan add a quote by Lang Leav
item.description:
"It was a question I had worn on my lips for days - like a loose thread on my favourite sweater I couldn't resist pulling - despite knowing it could all unravel around me.
"Do you love me?" I ask.
In your hesitation I found my answer." -- Lang Leav

item.title: Fluffy Kitty Susan add a quote by Lang Leav
item.description:
"Souls" When two souls fall in love, there is nothing else but the yearning to be close to the other. The presence that is felt through a hand held, a voice heard, or a smile seen.
Souls do not have calendars or clocks, nor do they understand the notion of time or distance. They only know it feels right to be with one another.
This is the reason why you miss someone so much when they are not there— even if they are only in the very next room. Your soul only feels their absence— it doesn’t realize the separation is temporary." -- Lang Leav

item.title: Fluffy Kitty Susan add a quote by Lang Leav
item.description: "Can I ask you something? Anything. Why is it every time we say goodnight, it feels like goodbye?" -- Lang Leav

item.title: Fluffy Kitty Susan add a quote by Lang Leav
item.description:
"It happens like this.
"One day you meet someone and for some inexplicable reason, you feel more connected to this stranger than anyone else--closer to them than your closest family. Perhaps this person carries within them an angel--one sent to you for some higher purpose; to teach you an important lesson or to keep you safe during a perilous time. What you must do is trust in them--even if they come hand in hand with pain or suffering--the reason for their presence will become clear in due time."
Though here is a word of warning--you may grow to love this person but remember they are not yours to keep. Their purpose isn't to save you but to show you how to save yourself. And once this is fulfilled; the halo lifts and the angel leaves their body as the person exits your life. They will be a stranger to you once more.
-------------------------------------------------
It's so dark right now, I can't see any light around me. That's because the light is coming from you. You can't see it but everyone else can." -- Lang Leav

item.title: Fluffy Kitty Susan add a quote by Lang Leav
item.description: "It's so dark right now, I can't see any light around me. That's because the light is coming from you. You can't see it but everyone else can." -- Lang Leav

item.title: Fluffy Kitty Susan add a quote by Lang Leav
item.description: "Love is a game of tic-tac-toe, constantly waiting for the next x or o." -- Lang Leav

item.title: Fluffy Kitty Susan add a quote by Lang Leav
item.description: "In her eyes, the sadness sings— of one who was destined, for better things." -- Lang Leav

item.title: Fluffy Kitty Susan add a quote by Lang Leav
item.description: "I was there in your forgetting, until I was forgot." -- Lang Leav

item.title: Fluffy Kitty Susan add a quote by Lang Leav
item.description:
"Beauty's Curse
Her bow is drawn to worlds of dark, where arrows spring and miss their mark— she'll turn their heads but not their hearts." -- Lang Leav

item.title: Fluffy Kitty Susan add a quote by Lang Leav
item.description:
"When words run dry, he does not try, nor do I.
We are on par.
He just is, I just am and we just are" -- Lang Leav

item.title: Fluffy Kitty Susan add a quote by Lang Leav
item.description:
"You were the one, I wanted most to stay.
But time could not be kept at bay.
The more it goes, the more it's gone, the more it takes away." -- Lang Leav

item.title: Fluffy Kitty Susan add a quote by Lang Leav
item.description: "I had my first dream about you last night. Really? She smiles. What was it about? I don't remember exactly but the whole time I was dreaming, I knew you were mine." -- Lang Leav

item.title: Fluffy Kitty Susan add a quote by Lang Leav
item.description: "Before the tears that tore us, when our history was before us." -- Lang Leav

item.title: Fluffy Kitty Susan add a quote by Lang Leav
item.description:
"A marker drawn to show our end, is etched into its line.
The briefest moment shared with you— the longest on my mind." -- Lang Leav

item.title: Fluffy Kitty Susan add a quote by Lang Leav
item.description: "We may be just two different clocks, that do not tock in unison." -- Lang Leav

item.title: Fluffy Kitty Susan add a quote by Lang Leav
item.description: "Before I fell in love with words, with setting skies and singing birds - it was you I fell in love with first." -- Lang Leav

item.title: Fluffy Kitty Susan add a quote by Lang Leav
item.description:
"You were you, and I was I; we were two before our time.
I was yours before I knew, and you have always been mine too." -- Lang Leav
